```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```
# Paths & files

```{r}
path_raw <- file.path("Data", "Raw")

path_output <- file.path("Data", "Processed")

# Get the filnames for Excel files only (avoiding temporary open file)
file_names <- list.files(path_raw, pattern = "^[^~]*xlsx")
file_name <- file_names[3]  # temporary will be replaced by the loop
```



## Import data from Excel

```{r}
# get the column names
cnames <- read_excel(file.path(path_raw, file_name), 
                     sheet = "14C.data", 
                     skip = 2, 
                     n_max = 0) %>% 
    names()

# get the units
units <- read_excel(file.path(path_raw, file_name), 
                    sheet = "14C.data", 
                    skip = 3, 
                    col_names = cnames,
                    n_max = 1)

# get the data
datasheet <- read_excel(file.path(path_raw, file_name), 
                    sheet = "14C.data", 
                    skip = 4, 
                    col_names = cnames
                    )

```
